analysis.description:
GoodDayToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/38/0x44a1b86ffa821bcadb636a4493aa50d5ab0ddf4a.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x44a1b86ffa821bcadb636a4493aa50d5ab0ddf4a.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x44a1b86ffa821bcadb636a4493aa50d5ab0ddf4a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/38/0x44a1b86ffa821bcadb636a4493aa50d5ab0ddf4a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x44a1b86ffa821bcadb636a4493aa50d5ab0ddf4a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
